name: Oathborn: The Chronicle of Ruin
summary: Oathborn: The Chronicle of Ruin is a grand-scale SRPG that charges you with leading a band of soldiers through a dangerous, desperate world of shifting alliances and arcane oblivion. Inspired by classics like Ogre Battle, Suikoden II, and Final Fantasy Tactics, Oathborn is a game about strategic decision-making, compelling characters, and a story with no promises of happy ends or easy answers.

name: Oasis Invasion
summary:
Robots have attacked the flying city! But the shield protecting the city is not infinite.
Take control of the big cannon defending the city, get the highest score, and repel this deadly attack!

name: Oasis
summary:
Oasis is a strategy/puzzle game depicting the journey of an Egyptian prince to unite the fragmented kingdoms of his father's domain. Players explore the sorcerous fog that has descended on these kingdoms, uniting lost cities to fend off barbarian hordes.

Searching the kingdom uses a mechanic similar to Minesweeper, but with the difference that there are no harmful clicks. Each click removes fog from one space and reveals some information about what may be found in nearby spaces. Alternatively, once the player has removed enough fog to reveal useful terrain features, they may use a turn to instead build roads between cities, search them for hidden treasures, or take other actions to prepare for the barbarian hordes.

When the player runs out of turns, the barbarians arrive (from where?) and attack. The player will have ten seconds to move people to the nearest city (if the player built the right roads!) and then it's out of your hands. Victory depends on having made the right preparations. So while every click on the map is good, they may not all be equally good for your current situation.

The full version of the game includes the Pharaoh's Challenge, a selection of campaign games each telling a different story, and each using different variant rules on the basic game.

name: Oakwood Academy of Spells and Sorcery
summary: Oakwood Academy of Spells and Sorcery is a fun adult visual novel filled with romance and adventure. You play as Thomas Middleton, a first-year student, who tries to get by while encountering a diverse set of wacky and fascinating characters along the way!

name: OASE: Other Age Second Encounter
summary:
OASE - Other Age Second Encounter is a game with elements of adventure, dating sim, and visual novel. In OASE, you control Prince of Zeiva Empire in his quest to date a girl using a machine called Luv Luv Nitarou Dynamite. With it you can summon girls from any place, time or space. Follow stories of different characters and collect as many ending as you can!

OASE has a total of 10 summonable girls, 200+ illustrations, and 55 endings.

name: Oasis
summary: This is a game about thoughts and the need to stop a little bit.

name: Oaken Tower
summary: Oaken Tower is a synergy-heavy PvP autobattler where your tower of items fights other players. Build deadly combos and scale exponentially. Every decision matters.

name: Oath of Genesis
summary: The game primarily focuses on Genesis, who is assigned to protect the village named TimberShade from Wolves. The game's story-line takes the player from the war between the Wolves and the people of TimberShade.

name: Oasis Defense
summary: Oasis Defense is a minimalist tower defense game with free and changeable strategies. You will plant trees to fight against the ghost army and protect your oasis. Here, every game is a journey to choose the path of evolution.

name: OAOA: Off and on Again
summary: Off And On Again tells the story of a hero tasked with rebooting time. The game world is created and destroyed during play, with the hero having the ability to turn parts of the world off and on again. You will be required to use both brains and skill to overcome the enemies and obstacles in your path.

name: Oakbound Quest
summary: Embark on a mystical journey through an ancient forest in this thrilling 2D platformer. Play as a fearless warrior on a sacred mission to recover the lost oaks and restore life to your village.

name: Oakley's World
summary: Oakley's World is, on the surface, a virtual pet game demo where you play mini-games to look after Oakley. As things are played, though, there's a sense that something else, than first appears, is going on. Also, there are, at times, things that appear or can be found in the demo (as part of an ARG).

name: OA: Other Age
summary:
You are the Princess of Zeiva Kingdom. In order to celebrate your 16th birthday, Green Mage Nitarou gives you a special machine that allows you to summon your dream guy.

Enter the world of Other Age, where Genetic Glow and Imaginary Realm characters collide. There are 10 obtainable characters to choose from, complete with various mini-games, events and endings.

name: OAsys
summary: A fast-paced competitive racing game set in a solarpunk universe. You play as a speedbot, an athlete competing in a spectacular and perilous new tournament filled with robots, lasers, and a healthy dose of style !

name: O.A.C: World Begins
summary: Are you a leader? Once you convince your nation you are their leader, it will be time to show the world your own political, people management and military strategy skills. O.A.C aims to be a breath of fresh air in the grand strategy genre that will inspire its own kind of videogames!

name: Oath
summary: Oath is a new free-to-play open world action combat, sandbox MMORPG from Ready-Up Studios built with the powerful Unreal Engine 4 and SpatialOS! It features action-based combat with many classes to choose from including Berserker, Pyromancer, Rogue, Guardian, Knight, Ranger, Cryomancer, and more coming. Oath also has advanced social systems such as the revolutionized Guild Land system which allows guilds to purchase land and build their own base that enables special features.

name: OA Family
summary: OA Family, a game with learning and relaxation. The main system of the game is to bring the popular English vocabulary game Hangman to do in a player-friendly format with a helper.

name: Oakwood
summary: Welcome to Oakwood, a long abandoned campground nestled in the forests of British Columbia. Explore the woods, caves, and a dilapidated lodge in search of your friends, while surviving the prehistoric horrors that now haunt the grounds.

name: Oath of the Necromancer
summary:
Oath of the Necromancer is a rogue-like & bullet-heaven mix; survive by raising hordes of skeletons to fight alongside you against the many foes of ancient Egypt and Greece.

In the name of Serapis, the ancient Graeco-Egyptian God of life and death, you rebuild a lost religion, raise legendary heroes, find mighty relics, and raise powerful armies of the dead.

name: Oath
summary: Fe:Fates Xander/Laslow Tribute Game

name: Oasis: Dark Forest
summary: Darkness rules the land. Defend your holy tree. Plant trees to defeat the ghost army. Explore and collect resources in a randomly generated forest world. Upgrade your technology tree. You are the light in the darkness.

name: Oasis Obby Parkour
summary: Welcome to Oasis Obby Parkour

name: Oath
summary: Take the Oath, overcome the Trials, and discover the truth of the Heart in this original indie RPG.

name: Oasis: Tokyo
summary: Oasis: Tokyo is an FPS with a focus on inventory management that has roguelite elements. Complete procedurally generated missions in a shady underworld.

name: Oaken
summary: Oaken is a tactical turn-based roguelike with deck management and 3D figurines. Explore the world of the Great Oak, gather allies and enhancements, learn to use the positioning and rotation for your advantage, choose how to upgrade your cards - all in order to restore the Oak's Song.

name: Oath: There is a You That Remains
summary: DLC expansion to vai5000's game oath, a companion to her 2025 album.

name: Oathbreakers
summary: Oathbreakers is a multiplayer open-world fantasy VR RPG that incorporates a unique blend of strategic precision-based realtime action combat, with unrestricted player vs player competitiveness, in a relaxing survival RPG themed environment.

name: Oasis Blitz
summary: Oasis Blitz is a third person driller! Speed through floating islands, using your drill to dive down into terrain and then burst back out. Shred down slopes on your sandboard, and grapple to enemies for extra momentum.

name: O Aventureiro
summary: O Aventureiro is a text-adventure where in search of an adventure, you clandestinely teleport aboard a cargo ship whose crew is made up of exotic beings from various planets. Your objective is to accumulate all the money you can by searching the ship's rooms.

name: O:anquan
summary:
O:anquan is a number puzzle from the game designer of Politaire.

The idea of o:anquan is inspired by the control of a traditional Vietnamese children's board game (Spread the number to score).

name: Oasis Mission: Colony Sim
summary: A Sci-Fi colony and strategy sim with a complex economy, immersive logistics, and a war against the rise of the machines! Build your colony and ensure supplies for your people. Automate industrial ships and create combat groups to defend against waves of enemies.

name: Oath
summary: A short story companion to vai5000's EP, oath

name: Oathbound: Arena
summary: Turn-based tactical PvP combat with high-fantasy RPG units. Meet Oathbound: Arena. This stand-alone PvP play mode of the upcoming MMORPG Oathbound lets you experience the core combat mechanics in engaging 1v1 online battles. Rally your oath-bound units and lead them all to victory!

name: Oatmeal
summary: Oatmeal. This game is about oatmeal. In this game, you have a spoon, and 1 minute to eat as much oatmeal as you can. It's not as easy as you think.

name: Oasis Shooting Ops
summary: Top-down action game, in which you'll have to fight off waves of different enemies. In this hell of a battle you won't be able to solely rely on your weapons. You'll have to use your creativity and set up different traps to survive.

name: Oak Hill
summary:
In this new short 2D adventure you play as Theo, a dog! After dying, you find yourself in Oak Hill, the dimension between life and death. You will have to face many challenges to reach your best friend Harriet to say goodbye and to move on.
Meet Spirit, the guide who will accompany you on this adventure.

name: Oathborne
summary: Oathborne is a top down action roguelite hack and slash. Unlock new skills for your class as you delve deeper into treacherous dungeons with traps, bosses, puzzles, and hordes of enemies. Each dive into darkness contains a monolith which must be destroyed to open pathways in the overworld.

name: Oasis the Great
summary: Oasis the Great is an online multi-player physics based sandbox game that have infinite possibilities.

name: Oases
summary: My grandfather's plane was reported lost in 1960 during the Algeria Independence War, days before the birth of his first child. This is a story about what I like to think happened to him.

name: Oakenfold
summary:
Oakenfold is a clever turn-based strategy roguelike, but with a twist! The TimeScrubber lets you rewind time and plan out your ideal path to victory.

Outsmart the Biocides wrecking our planet in this roguelike adventure. Manipulate them, shove them, drown them, crush them, have them attack each other... No matter how you do it, keep your precious cargo safe at all times!

It's your last chance to escape our inhospitable planet.

name: Oak Defenders
summary: You play as Gobby the tree goblin. You are endowed with the position of the almighty Oak Defender. You must protect the mighty enchanted oak from the surrounding forest creatures. You must keep the tree alive or it will die and the forest will become corrupted.

name: Oafmatch
summary:
Oafmatch is a role-playing game that combines traditional RPG turn-based combat with match-three and roguelike mechanics.
Go into battle with four party members from thirty playable classes, power up weapons by making colored gem matches, then unleash devastating attacks on your enemies!

name: Oak Adventure the Maze
summary: You are Oak a Man From Another Dimension Who are Summoned For Saving This Crumbling World by Adventuring and Solving Mysteries Through Labyrinths.

name: Oatboy vs. Slime Mold
summary: Oatboy vs. Slime Mold is an attempt at making a fast-paced action game with a unique concept and original game play that would fit in with late-70's/Early-80's Arcade games.

name: Oasis VR
summary: Oasis is an amazing virtual environment where you can make new friends around the world! You can chat with them, play poker, go bowling, or even arrange a home party in several virtual worlds. You can also create your own avatars for you and your friends!

name: Oathbreaker
summary: A free medieval fantasy visual novel / story game

name: Oasis Road
summary:
Oasis Road is a game in which the player controls a group of kids that lives in a future world that is all in the desert, They will have to explore the world (specially the ancient ruins of old cities) in search of rare items and make new travel routes. The game could be different depending of the objects found.

During their journeys they will have to face different dangers and enemies. The gameplay in battles are the classic turn based rpg. The game map will be drawing during the journeys showing the objects and items that are in each place.

At the beginning of the game the player can choose his character between 18 different characters (male or famale ones) and he can also change the character name.

name: Oathbreaker: Season 2
summary: A medieval fantasy visual novel / story game

name: Oath of Miko
summary: The Oath of Miko is a round based game of light war chess based on the combination of war chess and strategic management. Based on the battle playing method of war chess, she supplemented it with strategic management orientation - rather than RPG orientation, in order to bring different experiences to war chess lovers and simulation management lovers.

name: Oak Beats
summary: Music Game

name: Oaths of Light
summary: Play as a young woman whose life is forever changed by a series of unexpected events.Unfold mysteries, enjoy non-linear storytelling with branching paths based on your choices, and engage in JRPG-inspired battles mixing real-time and turn-based elements.
